Title: Beef
Writer: Christopher Storer, Sofya Levitsky-Weitz, Karen Joseph Adcock
Actors: Jeremy Allen White, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri
Plot: Faced with the reality of opening a new restaurant, the crew must come up with a plan, but the financial problems are bigger than expected, and Carmy has to make a risky decision.
